channel.title: SetpArrayProps_R: array prop '(null)'is at index zero.
channel.description:
So I was playing this awesome game, had a few problems but i manage to fix em. Yesterday it was awesome, i played for like 2-3 hours. Today when I start the game it said - " SetpArrayProps_R: array prop '(null)'is at index zero. "
Dunno why, and i can't find the answer. I have all of Valve games and I use
SteamAppId 220 ToolsAppId 211
Please help, wanna play this awesome game >_<
Awwwkay, sorry for the post, i fixed it. Changed the SteamAppID to 218 >_<
